title: AMD Plans to Use Glass Substrates in its 2025/2026 Lineup of High-Performan
excerpt: AMD reportedly plans to incorporate glass substrates into its high-performance system-in-packages (SiPs) sometimes between 2025 and 2026. title: TSMC to Expand CoWoS Capacity by 60% Yearly Through 2026
Report: Packaging Issues, PS5 Demand May Be Hurting TSMC Production - Extre
excerpt: The hardware shortages currently hitting most of the PC market may be caused by a shortage in a necessary component in chip manufacturing, not low yields on TSMC's 7nm node.
